items.title: Celebrate safer Carnaval, Memorial Day Weekend, Juneteenth, and the summer season
items.summary: Tips from SF Department of Public Health as we head into the summer holidays.

items.title: SF allows more flexibility for open activities within the Yellow Tier
items.summary: San Francisco will allow a greater range of activities and remove some operational requirements on open activities as it continues to prepare for full reopening.

items.title: People 12 and older are now eligible for the COVID-19 vaccine in SF
items.summary: San Francisco to continue equity strategy to ensure residents of hardest-hit neighborhoods receive equitable access to vaccine.

items.title: San Francisco responds to FDA Emergency Use Authorization of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine for youth ages 12 to 15
items.summary: On Monday, May 10, the Food and Drug Administration granted Emergency Use Authorization of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine for individuals 12 to 15 years old.
